author: sebb
msg: Reinstate ThreadGroup/uncaughtException so all threads can be stopped when first failure occurs.
Remove start() from ctor, as bad practice to do so.
No need to wait 10 * holdTime; just wait long enough for threads to start.
Check that 1/2 threads failed rather than just some.
Seems to be a bug in per-user processing; add some debug to the PoolTest threads.
